sections.heading: 352,101.353,121.93, and121.931of the Revised Code do not apply to:(A) The following elected state officers or their offices: the governor, the lieutenant governor, the secretary of state, the auditor of state, the treasurer of state, and the attorney general;(B) A state institution of higher educati
sections.text: 352,101.353,121.93, and121.931of the Revised Code do not apply to:(A) The following elected state officers or their offices: the governor, the lieutenant governor, the secretary of state, the auditor of state, the treasurer of state, and the attorney general;(B) A state institution of higher education as defined in section3345.011of the Revised Code; or(C) The public employees retirement system, the Ohio police and fire pension fund, the state teachers retirement system, the school employees retirement system, and the state highway patrol retirement system.
